faq.question_1: What is the minimum investment amount?
faq.answer_1: The minimum investment amount varies by deal, but typically starts from 1,000 SAR. Each deal page shows its specific minimum investment requirement.
faq.question_2: How long does it take to verify my account?
faq.answer_2: Account verification usually takes 1-2 business days. We'll notify you via email once your account is verified and ready to start investing.
faq.question_3: When will I receive my returns?
faq.answer_3: Returns are distributed according to the timeline specified in each deal. You'll receive notifications when profit distributions are made to your account.
faq.question_4: Can I cancel my investment after confirmation?
faq.answer_4: Investment cancellations are subject to the terms of each deal. Generally, you have a 48-hour cooling-off period after making an investment.
faq.question_5: How do I withdraw my funds?
faq.answer_5: You can withdraw funds from your wallet at any time through the wallet section. Withdrawals are processed within 2-3 business days to your registered bank account.
